## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/connectedvninfoeqclasses">ConnectedVNInfoEqClasses</a> - Helper class that can divide VNInfos in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> into equivalence clases of connected components.

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> that has multiple connected components can be broken into multiple <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervals">LiveIntervals</a>.

Given a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> that may have multiple connected components, run:

unsigned numComps = ConEQ.Classify(LI); if (numComps &gt; 1) &#123; // allocate numComps-1 new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervals">LiveIntervals</a> into LIS&#91;1..&#93; ConEQ.Distribute(LIS); &#125;

Definition at line 1007 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveinterval-h">LiveInterval.h</a>.

Returns the number of connected components.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveinterval-h/#l01016">1016</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveinterval-h">LiveInterval.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveinterval-cpp/#l01329">1329</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveinterval-cpp">LiveInterval.cpp</a>.

### Distribute() {#a5d79e4d110e15056182588d168ac6b2f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ConnectedVNInfoEqClasses::Distribute (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp; LI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &#42; LIV=[], <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp; MRI)</>}>
Distribute values in <code>LI</code> into a separate <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervals">LiveIntervals</a> for each connected component.

LIV must have an empty <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> for each additional connected component. The first connected component is left in <code>LI</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveinterval-h/#l01026">1026</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveinterval-h">LiveInterval.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveinterval-cpp/#l01371">1371</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveinterval-cpp">LiveInterval.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
